nodes.text: An Arcona lived during the Clone Wars. While on Coruscant, the Arcona was piloting an airspeeder when Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi landed on the vehicle, on his way to the Jedi Temple to stop a Separatist plot to sabotage the funeral of Jedi Master Halsey. Instead of taking Kenobi to the Temple, the Arcona screamed in fright and tipped the airspeeder sideways, knocking Kenobi off the vehicle.
